BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Highlight
BundleInfo.Author: ProteinCraft
BundleInfo.Description:
Highlight tools for ChimeraX.
Highlight residues via interpolation between most common chain color and specified highlight color.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: highlight :: General :: Print information about currently highlighted residues
ChimeraX :: Command :: highlight add :: General :: Add residues for highlighting
ChimeraX :: Command :: highlight remove :: General :: Remove residues from highlighting
ChimeraX :: Command :: highlight rm :: General :: Remove residues from highlighting (alias for highlight remove)
